string:
In order to cryopreserve the organoids, Matrigel is removed from 7-day cultures with Cell Recovery Solution as previously described and are resuspended in freezing medium (10% DMSO in Advanced DMEM/F12 supplemented with Y-27632) at a density equivalent to 3 confluent drops/500mL.

19.
refer: as previously described refers to the process of removing Matrigel from 7-day cultures with Cell Recovery Solution.
